data.text: Mbiri yabwino ndi yopambana mafuta onunkhira bwino,
Kuli bwino kupita ku nyumba yamaliro
Chisoni nʼchabwino kusiyana ndi kuseka,
Mtima wa munthu wanzeru nthawi zonse umalingalira za imfa,
Kuli bwino kumva kudzudzula kwa munthu wanzeru
Kuseka kwa zitsiru kuli ngati
Kuzunza ena kumasandutsa munthu wanzeru kukhala chitsiru,
Mathero ake a chinthu ndi abwino kupambana chiyambi chake,
Usamafulumire kukwiya mu mtima mwako,
Usamafunse kuti, “Nʼchifukwa chiyani masiku amakedzana anali abwino kupambana masiku ano?”
Nzeru ngati cholowa, ndi chinthu chabwino
Nzeru ndi chitetezo,
Taganizirani zimene Mulungu wazichita:
Pamene zinthu zili bwino, sangalala;
Pa moyo wanga wopanda phinduwu ndaona zinthu ziwiri izi:
Usakhale wolungama kwambiri
Usakhale woyipa kwambiri,
Nʼkwabwino kuti utsate njira imodzi,
Nzeru zimapereka mphamvu zambiri kwa munthu wanzeru
Palibe munthu wolungama pa dziko lapansi
Usamamvetsere mawu onse amene anthu amayankhula,
pakuti iwe ukudziwa mu mtima mwako
Zonsezi ndinaziyesa ndi nzeru zanga ndipo ndinati,
Nzeru zimene zilipo,
Kotero ndinayikapo mtima wanga kuti ndidziwe,
Ndinapeza kanthu kowawa kupambana imfa,
Mlaliki akunena kuti, “Taonani, chimene ndinachipeza ndi ichi:
pamene ine ndinali kufufuzabe
Chokhacho chimene ndinachipeza ndi ichi:
